# pendingTransactions

**Instance Property**

Incomplete transactions.

## Declaration

```swift
var pendingTransactions: [CXTransaction] { get }
```

## Accessing Pending Transaction and Call Actions

- **pendingCallActions(of:withCall:)**: Returns all call actions in any pending transactions of the specified class for the specified call identifier that are incomplete.

items.description: Returns all call actions in any pending transactions of the specified class for the specified call identifier that are incomplete.
items.name: pendingCallActions(of:withCall:)
